title: CRYING Freeman - OVA, Film, Killer's Romance, Dragon from Russia
description:
This torrent PACK contains the COMPLETE collection for the "Crying Freeman" series: OVA Episodes and THREE "Live-Action" Films!

Plot Synopsis:

Crying Freeman (1988-94 OVA Anime Series - 480p DUAL Audio) - "Yo Hinomura was an ordinary Japanese potter when a run-in with a Chinese mafia changed his life forever. Now an assassin for the 108 Dragons, Yo is the perfect killing machine. As a sign for remorse over his victims, he sheds tears after eliminating his targets. Because of this, he is infamously known by the Dragons and every crime syndicate in the world as "Crying Freeman."

Crying Freeman: A Killer's Romance (1990 - 480p) - "A triad assassin is sent to kill a female witness to a murder only to fall in love with her instead. A Hong Kong remake of the Japanese manga Crying Freeman."

Crying Freeman: The Dragon from Russia (1990 - 480p) - "A group called 800 Dragons aims to assassinate criminals who appear to have gotten away with their crimes."

Crying Freeman (1995 - 720p) - "A lethal assassin for a secret Chinese organisation, who sheds tears of regret each time he kills, is seen swiftly and mercilessly executing three Yakuza gangsters by a beautiful artist. She is captivated by the grace of his kill and later falls in love with him. An intense power struggle for the leadership of the Yakuza Clans ensues as they seek vengeance for the death of their leader. They soon realise the fatal mistake of underestimating the deadly skills of the Crying Freeman."

_____________________________


Name (Title): CRYING Freeman (1988-1995): Anime OVA Series and LIVE-Action Films (Dragon from Russia, Killer's Romance, 1995 Movie) - 480p-720p x264.

Category Type: Movies and Anime.

Length (Duration): VARIES by Film/Video.

Year(s): 1988-1995 (Complete Series).

Starring: Marc Dacascos, "Crying Freeman", Julie Condra, Tcheky Karyo, Rae Dawn Chong, Byron Mann, etc...

Genre(s): Action, Crime, Thriller, Mystery, Martial Arts.

Resolution: 480p (for everything else) and 720p (for the "1995" film).

Rip Type (Source): DVDRips (for everything else) and BrRip (for the "1995" film).

Codec Type: x264.

Format of File(s): MKV(s) and MP4(s).

Audio Format & Language(s): English and Japanese (for the OVA Series and 1995 Film) and CHINESE (for the "1990" films) - AC3 for the Live-Action films and AAC for the OVA Series. 

Subtitles: YES: ENGLISH "SoftSubs" for the ANIME Series and HARD Subs for the LIVE-Action (Chinese-language) Movies. For the "1995" film, it only has HARD-Coded ENGLISH Subs for the brief "Japanese" parts spoken and I have included in "SoftSubbed" SRT Subs (for the ENGLISH parts which make up the MAJORITY of the movie, anyways).
